predicate.note: Frames file for 'outbid' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Minimal comparison with 'bid'.

example.name: from corpus
example.text: Ratners Group PLC ... said it would be prepared *trace* to outbid Ratners's initial offer.

example.name: with goods
example.text: John desperately tried *trace* to outbid Mary for the priceless coprolites.
